sentences.sentence: In one photo he sidles up to a can of Fanta orange.
sentences.translation: 在一张照片里，他贴着一罐芬达汽水合影。

sentences.sentence: Not 10 minutes into our lunch at Google HQ in Mountain View, California, a groupie sidles up.
sentences.translation: 加利福尼亚州山景城，Google总部，我们共进午餐还不到10分钟，一名追星族走了过来。

sentences.sentence: Whenever there is a meeting, he sits at the back and sidles out in the middle of the meeting.
sentences.translation: 只要是开会，他总是坐在最后，会议进行了一半就溜走了。
